Bachelor of science in Computer Science & Information Engineering

descriptions: Architected and realized a micro-frontend service decomposition, splitting main site service architecture to achieve reductions in service response time and enhancing development efficiency.
Designed and developed a migration script using JavaScript, based on Abstract Syntax Tree operations to accelerate the decomposition of the main site service process, reducing development costs.
Elevated deployment efficiency by implementing the CI/CD pipeline for micro-frontend architecture within an Nx monorepo, utilizing Github Actions to automate the deployment process.
Designed and implemented the HLS video carousel player that operates seamlessly across web and mobile environments to increase user retention time and boost platform traffic.
Improved marketing efficiency and conversion rates by optimizing SEO and implementing A/B testing features within Nuxt.js.
Crafted a dynamic content management system for landing pages, substantially enhancing the speed and efficiency of experimental deployments.
Implemented automated video recording downloading using AWS SQS and Lambda, enhancing system data utilization efficiency.
Mentored team members, providing supports for feature developments and product refactoring.

Developed enterprise mail system using Angular for frontend development, and Node.js with GraphQL as the middleware for backend API integration, providing modern layouts and more intelligent, secure features.
Containerized the mail system with Docker for convenient and rapid deployment, reducing the time required for deployment and maintenance.
Utilized Nginx as a reverse proxy server to effectively control access points and enhance the system's safety and reliability.
Designed and implemented the automatic deployment with Docker and GitLab CI/CD.
Designed and built a bot framework, leveraging Hubot to build enterprise internal chatbot on instant messenger.
